attributes.action: close down ALL unelected quangoes at midnight on 31 December 2008 and return all publicly funded activity to the realm of PROPERLY ELECTED, by the people, organisations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What more can be said.  QUANGOES are by their nature not democratic since it is only self-interested politicised - supported by the major political parties AND supporting EVERY political aim of the party - individuals who have failed to become elected can get on them.  Just how many QUANGOES do you know with basic rate taxpayers among their membership.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
